headline: Lennox initiated with an Underweight at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley initiated coverage of Lennox (LII) with an Underweight rating and $595 price target The firm models about 200 basis points of organic downside in 2025 on cycle pressure and residential share risk, adding that to justify the current multiple, Lennox needs to show sustained volume outgrowth compared to the market, which “has not been the case historically.” Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
